intro.description: In this step, you will define the specific robotic systems for the problem model. Robotic systems could be robots and their subsystems such as specific actuators, sensors, etc.

item.title: Define specific sensors
item.description: To define specific robotic systems, use the components definition diagram.

subitem.label: Go to the model explorer view
right click on the model, and choose create new diagram. Then choose Components definition diagram.
Create your specific robotic systems. You can add Data Flow or Service ports to the systems. Data Flow ports have to be typed by a data type, service ports by an interface.
